BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 170259Z MAR BY
   M/V NPS VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-30.00S 041-26.00W, 24-59.17S 041-43.42W,
   24-02.45S 041-47.43W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 170359Z MAR.
